zh.title: 埃及总统萨达特历史性访问以色列
日内瓦美苏首脑会议召开
欧洲安全与合作组织巴黎宪章签署
希腊“埃尔卡号”油轮沉没，污染严重
美国国家橄榄球联盟（NFL）比赛取消
尼日利亚发生汽车炸弹袭击事件
欧盟与伊朗达成初步核协议

en.title: Anwar Sadat became the first Arab leader to officially visit Israel.
Ayatollah Khomeini ordered the release of female and Black hostages in Iran.
President Reagan and Mikhail Gorbachev met in Geneva for the first time.
The "Black Monday" stock market crash affected global markets.
The European Space Agency's Olympus satellite was launched.
Vincent van Gogh's "Portrait of the Artist Without Beard" sold for $71.5 million.
The NCAA stripped USC of its 2004 national championship.
A double suicide bombing near the Iranian embassy in Beirut killed 23.
The final episode of the TV show "Gilmore Girls: A Year in the Life" aired on Netflix.
